General.Name: Digitalbridge Group Inc
General.Description: DigitalBridge (NYSE: DBRG) is a leading global alternative asset manager dedicated to investing in digital infrastructure. With a heritage of over 25 years investing in and operating businesses across the digital ecosystem, including cell towers, data centers, fiber, small cells, and edge infrastructure, the DigitalBridge team manages approximately $100 billion of infrastructure assets on behalf of its limited partners and shareholders.
General.Address: 750 Park of Commerce Drive, Boca Raton, FL, United States, 33487-3650
